headline: At 59, Oscar’s Most Talented Rookie
abstract: A first-time nominee for “Pain and Glory,” the actor talks frankly about how his recent heart attack rescued him from a career that was going in circles.
lead_paragraph: Your Carpetbagger rarely plays favorites while covering the Oscar race, but when it comes to this year’s best-actor contender Antonio Banderas … well, who wouldn’t love to see his well-deserved comeback come to a glittery conclusion?
